taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Occurs in temporary swamps, raphia-swamps and swampy parts of slow flowing brooks in the swampy coastal rainforest.  14 cm TL (Ref. 3788).  Not a seasonal killifish. Bottom spawner, 2 months incubation.  Is easy to maintain in aquarium (Ref. 27139).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.title: Range Description
dataObjects.rights: © International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.rightsHolder: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D. 2010. Fundulopanchax sjostedti. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
This species is restricted to Nigeria and Cameroon.

Central Africa: In Lower Guinea, Fundulopanchax sjoestedti is limited to the coastal rainforest of southwestern Cameroon.

Western Africa: It is present in the coastal rivers and swamps of southern Nigeria.

agents.full_name: Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D.
Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Niger delta in southern and southeastern Nigeria and southwestern Cameroon.  Reported from Ghana (Ref. 11235).

dataObjects.title: IUCN Red List Assessment
dataObjects.rights: © International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.rightsHolder: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D. 2010. Fundulopanchax sjostedti. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
Red List Category
LC
Least Concern

Red List Criteria

Version
3.1

Year Assessed
2010

Assessor/s
Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D.

Reviewer/s
Snoeks, J., Tweddle, D., Getahun, A., Lalèyè, P., Paugy, D., Zaiss, R., Fishar, M.R.A & Brooks, E.

Contributor/s

Justification
This species has a wide enough distribution, with only localised threats, to qualify as Least Concern. It has also been assessed regionally as Least Concern for western Africa. In central Africa, Fundulopanchax sjoestedti is known from fewer than 5 localities. The species is threatened by the oil palm plantations in the region. Both the EOO and AOO qualify for the Endangered status.

agents.full_name: Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D.
Lalèyè, P., Moelants, T. & Olaosebikan, B.D.
